exceptions.rationale: Transitive through eslint/next lint toolchain; not part of production runtime dependency graph.
compensatingControls: CI blocks any high/critical advisories across full dependency tree.
CI blocks moderate+ advisories in production dependencies via --omit=dev audit gate.
Moderate advisories are reviewed monthly and tracked to expiration.
